entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: WNW 22 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning early in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
